data.Name: Joshua Shea
data.staff_title:
Marketing & Development Specialist: NERCVE
Teacher of Students with Visual Impairments: ICI
data.staff_bio:
Josh works in the field of educating students with visual impairments in a direct service role as a licensed Teacher of the Visually Impaired, through the Northeast Regional Center for Vision Education (NERCVE) in the Boston Public Schools at The English High School in Jamaica Plain.

Josh has been a staff member at the ICI for three years where, in addition to teaching he manages projects and writes grants related to educating individuals with visual impairments.
data.staff_ed:
B.A., Mass Communications, Emerson College
M.Ed., University of Massachusetts Boston
Specialization: Teacher of Students with Visual Impairments
